E Commerce Project Manager Position

28 Oct 2008

Manage the day-to-day operations, program roll outs, maintenance & overall quality control for e-commerce websites. Lead project teams through aspects of web based projects including development of project plans, scope of definition, execution and follow up. 5 yrs experience in e-commerce project manager role. Websphere background a plus. Company will relocate east of the Mississippi River. College education preferred.

This position is located in New Jersey. For details, please contact:
